700949f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Mayflower Avenue
700949f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., at the N.E. corner of Mayflower Ave., showing,
uuunder demolition, James E. Noonan's "Idle Hour Hotel.'
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
700949f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Mayflower Avenue, Bronx, NY

701438f-a.title: Bronx: Mayflower Avenue - Tremont Avenue (East)
701438f-a.text:
1206 Mayflower Ave., north of the N.E. corner of East Tremont
Ave.
About 1925.
W. B. Vernam.
701438f-a.folder: Mayflower Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
